titles.title: A bill for the relief of Meliha Cooks and Gorkhan Cooks.

action.text: Referred to House Committee on The Judiciary.
Referred to Subcommittee on Immigration, Refugees, and International Law.

bill.summary: 7/14/1987--Introduced. Declares two named individuals to have been lawfully admitted to the United States for permanent residence under the Immigration and Nationality Act.
